name: Smashbob (CyberDreams Interactive)
description:
SMASHBOB is a short, experimental indie game with an emphasis on speed-running, physics, and destruction! Smash through over 20 action-packed stages as fast as you can, improving your time and honing your skills.

With a pulsing Synthwave soundtrack by artist Isaac Mudge, and a neon-fuled vibrant aesthetic, SMASHBOB delievers high speed thrills in a bite size package that can be enjoyed in 20 minutes or 2 hours!

HOW TO PLAY:

Hold Left Mouse to hover in any direction

Press Right Mouse to smash into objects and gain a massive speed boost
